work.title: Three Short Letters of Ignatius of Antioch
Epistulae breves iii Ignatiii Antiocheni

edition.label: Three Short Letters of Ignatius of Antioch
edition.description: Cureton, William. Corpus Ignatianum: A Complete Collection of the Ignatian Epistles. Berlin: Asher and Co., 1859, pp. 1-55. Digital transcription edited by Jack Bull, then corrected and encoded in TEI-XML by Mark G. Bilby.
